meanings.definition: A post at the foot or head of a staircase, supporting the handrail.
meanings.sent1: The newels at the bottom of the stairs help hold the railing in place.
meanings.sent2: She gripped the newels tightly as she descended the staircase.
meanings.sent3: The newels decided to have a race to see who could reach the top first.
meanings.sent4: The newels stood tall like guardians, guiding people up and down.
meanings.sent5: The newels, like loyal soldiers, stood firm to support the handrail.

meanings.definition: A central post supporting the handrail of a staircase.

meanings.sent4: The newels stood proudly, like kings in the heart of the staircase.
meanings.sent5: The newels, like pillars of strength, held up the handrail with grace.

meanings.definition: A post at the foot of a staircase, supporting the handrail.
